items.title: qbot® Hyperautomation
items.description: qbot® Hyperautomation is a platform that utilizes advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, chatbots, and RPA to automate processes and tasks in a smarter and more efficient way.

items.title: qdisco ® : Process Discovery and Analysis
items.description: With our process discovery tools, you can view your processes, actual operations, and your staff's activities in 360 degrees on your screen, and uncover all hidden steps and deviations.

items.title: qkart®: Corporate Payment Solutions
items.description: Our enterprise payment solutions and prepaid card offerings are designed to help businesses manage their financial transactions securely and efficiently.
